title: Hear Me Roar
description:
Hannah Sussman, D.W. Baldwin and Kevin Allison share stories about bigoted bullies, a strange sound in the night, and how to dress for soccer practice.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Gabrielle Roth, The Mirrors, Hannah Sussman, D.W. Baldwin, Mike + The Mechanics, Sly and the Family Stone, kevin Allison)
